urls.title: The team - Flood Re
urls.description: Mark Hoban has been Chairman of the Board of Directors since February 2015. Mark helps us set our strategic direction, making sure we can meet objectives and manage risks effectively along the way. Judith is a Non-Executive Director. She holds a similar role with Invesco UK Ltd and is the Audit Chair at ICBC Standard Bank plc. As an experienced Managing Director and Chief Operating Officer, Judith adds over 25 years of financial services industry experience to Flood Re’s senior team. Huw Evans is our
